pepc-e/setup.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ================================
00002 !
00003 !         SETUP
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision$
00006 !
00007 !     Initialise constants and 
00008 !      simulation variables
00009 !
00010 !  ================================
00011 
00012 
00013 subroutine setup
00014   use physvars
00015   implicit none
00016 
00017   integer :: k, npb_pe
00018   real :: Qplas, Aplas
00019 
00020 
00021 
00022   namelist /pepcdata/ nep, nip, ne, ni, &
00023        mac, theta, mass_ratio, q_factor, eps, &
00024        system_config, target_geometry, ispecial, &
00025        Te_keV, Ti_keV, T_scale, &
00026        r_sphere, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, delta_mc, &
00027        xl, yl, zl, displace, bond_const, fnn, rho_min, lolam, &
00028        beam_config_in, np_beam, idim, &
00029        r_beam, u_beam, theta_beam, phi_beam, x_beam, start_beam, rho_beam, mass_beam, & 
00030        lambda, sigma, tpulse, vosc, omega, focus, x_offset,  z_offset, &
00031        nt, dt, mc_steps, idump, ivis, ivis_fields, ivis_domains, iprot, itrack, ngx, ngy, ngz, &
00032        vis_on, steering,  mc_init, restart, scheme, particle_bcs, &
00033        coulomb, bonds, lenjones, target_dup, ramp, &
00034        db_level, &
00035        constrain_proof, len_tripod, struct_step, uthresh, bfield_on
00036 
00037   !  Default input set
00038 
00039 
00040   system_config = 1  ! plasma target
00041   target_geometry = 1         ! random sphere
00042 
00043   db_level=1
00044 
00045   ! particles
00046   nep = 0 ! # plasma electrons per PE
00047   nip = 0
00048   ne = 100  ! Total # plasma electrons
00049   ni = 100  ! total # plasma ions
00050   mc_steps = 10
00051 
00052   xl = 2
00053   yl = 2
00054   zl = 2
00055 
00056   ! physics stuff
00057   force_const = 1.
00058   bond_const = 0.1
00059   rho0 = 1.0
00060   mac = 0        ! Multipole acceptance criterion (BH by default)
00061   theta = 0.5
00062   err_f = 0.01   ! force error tolerance
00063   Te_keV = 1.
00064   Ti_keV = Te_keV/10.
00065   mass_ratio = 10.
00066   q_factor = 1.
00067   uthresh = -1.
00068 
00069   r_sphere = 0.5
00070   x_plasma = 0.1    ! plasma disc thickness (2) or wire length (3)
00071   y_plasma = 1.     ! plasma width (slab target)
00072   z_plasma = 1.     ! plasma width (slab target)
00073   eps = 0.1
00074   fnn = 5  ! Neighbour search radius multiplier (x a_ii)
00075   delta_mc = r_sphere/5.
00076   displace(1:3) = (/0.,0.,0./)
00077 
00078 
00079   ! control
00080   nt = 600
00081   dt = 0.2
00082   trun = 0.
00083   ivis = 1
00084   ivis_fields = 1
00085   ivis_domains = 1
00086   itime_start = 0
00087   itrack = 10
00088 
00089   ngx = 25   ! Grid size for plots
00090   ngy = 25
00091   ngz = 25
00092   ! constrain
00093   constrain_proof = .001
00094   struct_step = 0
00095 
00096   ! Read actual inputs from namelist file
00097 
00098   open(10,file='run.h')
00099   read (10,NML=pepcdata)
00100 
00101 
00102   ! Derived parameters
00103 
00104   if (nep > 0) then
00105      ! particles specified per processor in input file
00106      ne = nep*n_cpu  ! total # electrons
00107      ni = nip*n_cpu  ! total # ions
00108   else
00109      ! total # particles specified in input file 
00110      nep = ne/n_cpu
00111      nip = ni/n_cpu
00112      npp = nep+nip
00113   endif
00114 
00115   !  npb_pe = np_beam/num_pe
00116   if (.not. restart) then
00117      if (nip*n_cpu /= ni .or. nep*n_cpu /= ne ) then
00118         ne = (nep+1)*n_cpu
00119         ni = (nip+1)*n_cpu
00120 
00121         if (my_rank==0) then
00122            write(*,'(//a//)') '*** Warning: number each particle species (ne, ni) must be divisible by # processors ***'
00123            write(*,'(a,i6)') '*** Resetting to ',ne,ni
00124         endif
00125  
00126 
00127      endif
00128   endif
00129 
00130   npart_total = ni+ne
00131   npp = npart_total/n_cpu  ! initial total # particles per processor
00132   nppm = npp*1.5
00133 
00134   geometry: select case(target_geometry)
00135 
00136   case(0) ! slab
00137      Vplas = x_plasma * y_plasma * z_plasma  ! plasma volume
00138      Aplas = x_plasma * y_plasma ! plasma area
00139      focus = (/xl / 2 + x_offset, yl / 2., zl / 2./) ! Centre of laser focal spot
00140      plasma_centre =  (/xl / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./) ! Centre of plasma
00141      number_faces = 6
00142 
00143   case(1) ! sphere
00144      Vplas = 4 * pi * r_sphere**3 / 3.
00145      Aplas = pi*r_sphere**2
00146      focus = (/xl / 2. - r_sphere, yl / 2., zl / 2./) ! Centre of laser focal spot
00147      plasma_centre = (/xl / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./) ! Centre of plasma
00148      number_faces = 1
00149 
00150   case(2) ! disc
00151      Vplas = pi * r_sphere**2 * x_plasma
00152      Aplas = x_plasma*y_plasma
00153      focus = (/xl / 2. - x_plasma / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./) ! Centre of laser focal spot
00154      plasma_centre = (/xl / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./) ! Centre of plasma        
00155      number_faces = 3
00156 
00157   case(3) ! wire
00158      Vplas = pi * r_sphere**2 * z_plasma
00159      Aplas = pi*r_sphere**2
00160      focus = (/xl / 2. - r_sphere + x_offset, yl / 2., zl / 2. + z_offset/) ! Centre of laser focal spot
00161      plasma_centre = (/xl / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./) ! Centre of plasma
00162      number_faces = 3
00163 
00164   case(4) ! ellipsoid
00165      Vplas = 4 * pi * x_plasma * y_plasma * z_plasma / 3.
00166      Aplas = pi*x_plasma*y_plasma*2
00167      focus = (/xl / 2. - x_plasma * r_sphere, yl / 2., zl / 2./) ! Centre of laser focal spot
00168      plasma_centre = (/xl / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./) 
00169      number_faces = 1
00170 
00171   case(5) ! wedge
00172      Vplas = .5 * x_plasma * y_plasma * z_plasma
00173      Aplas = .5*x_plasma*y_plasma
00174      focus = (/xl / 2. - x_plasma / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./)
00175      plasma_centre = (/xl / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./)
00176      number_faces = 5
00177 
00178   case(6) ! hemisphere
00179      Vplas = 4 * pi * r_sphere**3 / 6.
00180      Aplas = pi*r_sphere**2/2.
00181      focus = (/xl / 2. - r_sphere / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./)
00182      plasma_centre = (/xl / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./)
00183      number_faces = 2
00184 
00185   case(7) ! hollow sphere
00186      Vplas = (4 * pi / 3.) * (r_sphere**3 - (r_sphere - x_plasma)**3)
00187      Aplas = pi*(r_sphere**2-(r_sphere-x_plasma)**2)
00188      focus = (/xl / 2. - r_sphere / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./)
00189      plasma_centre = (/xl / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./)
00190      number_faces = 2
00191 
00192   case(8) ! hollow hemisphere
00193      Vplas = (4 * pi / 6.) * (r_sphere**3 - (r_sphere - x_plasma)**3)
00194      Aplas = pi/2.*(r_sphere**2-(r_sphere-x_plasma)**2)
00195      focus = (/xl / 2. - r_sphere / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./)
00196      plasma_centre = (/xl / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./)
00197      number_faces = 3
00198 
00199   end select geometry
00200 
00201   window_min = plasma_centre(1) - x_plasma/2.
00202   propag_laser=focus(1)
00203 
00204   if (system_config==2) then ! Electrons only user-defined config (special_start)
00205      Vplas = x_plasma * y_plasma * z_plasma
00206      Aplas = x_plasma * y_plasma
00207      focus = (/xl /4., yl / 2., zl / 2./) ! Centre of laser focal spot
00208      plasma_centre =  (/xl / 2., yl / 2., zl / 2./) ! Centre of plasma
00209      number_faces = 6  
00210   endif
00211 
00212   vte = sqrt(Te_keV/511.)  ! convert from keV to /c
00213 
00214 
00215   if (idim==3) then    ! 3D
00216      if (ne > 0) then
00217         qe = -Vplas*rho0/ne
00218         qi = -qe*q_factor
00219         mass_e = -qe
00220         Qplas = abs(qe)*ne
00221      else
00222         ! ions only
00223         qi = Vplas*rho0/ni
00224         qe = -qi
00225         mass_e = qi
00226         Qplas = abs(qi)*ni
00227      endif
00228      a_ii = (Vplas/ni)**(1./3.)
00229 
00230   else                ! 2D - use areal density instead of volume
00231      if (ne > 0) then
00232         qe = -Aplas*rho0/ne
00233         qi = -qe*q_factor
00234         mass_e = -qe
00235         Qplas = abs(qe)*ne
00236      else
00237         ! ions only
00238         qi = Aplas*rho0/ni
00239         qe = -qi
00240         mass_e = qi
00241         Qplas = abs(qi)*ni
00242      endif
00243      a_ii = (Aplas/ni)**(1./2.) ! assume 2D slab mode
00244   endif
00245 
00246   vti = sqrt(Ti_keV/511./mass_ratio)
00247   mass_i = mass_e*mass_ratio
00248   convert_fs = 10.*omega*lambda/(6*pi)     ! convert from wp^-1 to fs
00249   convert_mu = omega/2./pi*lambda          ! convert from c/wp to microns
00250   lolam = lolam*2.*pi/omega  ! normalise scale-length
00251   convert_keV = 2./3./Qplas*511     ! convert from code energy units to keV/particle
00252 
00253   r_neighbour = fnn*a_ii  ! Nearest neighbour search radius
00254 
00255   ! array allocation
00256 
00257   allocate ( x(nppm), y(nppm), z(nppm), ux(nppm), uy(nppm), uz(nppm), & 
00258        q(nppm), m(nppm), Ex(nppm), Ey(nppm), Ez(nppm), pot(nppm), pelabel(nppm), work(nppm) )
00259 
00260 end subroutine setup
00261
